inclusion.criterion: IgG & IgM levels within normal limits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of significant ongoing medical condition or progressive neurologic condition
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of significant recurrent infections, or ongoing active infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of a live vaccine within 4 weeks prior to treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of severe allergic reactions to humanized or murine monoclonal antibodies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of drug, alcohol or chemical abuse within 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of steroids or immunoglobulins during the 4 weeks prior to treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis with mild non-focal residual deficits, but no evidence of significant ongoing medical condition or progressive neurologic condition.
